data.message: Lost a lot of respect for em stick to what you know man leave politics alone we listen to your music to escape this shit we don’t care about your opinion especially when you stir it up and retreat to your fucking mansion tell me again how your in tune with anyone’s struggle now a days you’ve been downhill since the you went to rehab

replies.message: You was never a fan... He always gave his opinion on politics where were you? I'll quote the second greatest rapper alive - " Do you people listen to music or do you just skim through it"

Yeah It's the first time he has ever talked politics. He never voices his opinion, "And as we proceed,
To Mosh through this desert storm,
In these closing statements, if they should argue
Let us beg to differ
As we set aside our differences
And assemble our own army
To disarm this Weapon of Mass Destruction
That we call our President, for the present
And Mosh for the future of our next generation
To speak and be heard
Mr. President, Mr. Senator
Do you guy's hear us...hear us.." -Lyrics from the Eminem song "Mosh" 2004
Jonathan Powerhouse Concepcion ufff
All his albums are political. He was saying fuck Bush years ago.

💯💯💯 anyone who says shit like "won't be a fan anymore" was obviously never a fan because Em has always been political. Since the lyrics to Mosh were posted I won't post the video but stop frontin mother fuckers. Your "president" is also an "entertainer"... Or did we all forget that too? 

Love me some Marshall Mathers until the day I die!! ✊✊✊
Wish I could say the same for Trump to leave politics alone specially since he had a silver spoon up his ass since the day he was born
The vast majority of people don't know politics very well but will still give their opinions and vote. Why should Eminem be held to a different standard?
#trumpscum....you're an angry little piece of shit..😂😂😂
https://media.tenor.com/images/acd1b35d7c1ce19df1b398d2e19f204f/tenor.gif
Yeah, because he's never been political. I love how people want celebrities to stay out of politics, except for the one you elected.
NASCAR is life
Aw, poor wickle snowfwake :-D
Foolish troll Em has been political since day 1 and tRump is mentally inept, unstable and unfit for office.
No one gives a fuck about your respect.
Dude always spoke on politics. Fake outrage tastes nice.
Bet you think Kid Rock is a pretty cool dude though?? Keep your politics to yourself, when I don't agree with them... smdh.

You're telling him to stick to what he knows but let's not forget that Trump knows absolutely nothing about political s*** never had any political experience was just a celebrity / businessman so who should really stick to what they know I believe it's Trump here because that rap is what Eminem does On a daily basis so he is sticking to what he knows
You realize you sheep voted for a tv show host into office right? Lmao bye Felicia 👋🏻
Aww snowflake butthurt because no one likes him but pale prejudices pos’s lol
I was a fan also. Im not anymore. Not because of his political garbage but because at a certain age you realize that rap isnt music. Learn to play an instrument then get back to me.

***I'm Confused***
             LoL
It doesn't matter if Em WAS, HAS or IS....POLITCAL
An opinion IS and OPINION...its America...
The Freedom Of Speech
but its gotta be straight forward...there can't be an in between its just not possible when it comes to being AMERICAN...
If you respect our Vets...Our Country and  our Flag...you DONT take a knee during the National Anthem...that isn't RESPECT....thats a HYPOCRITE.
In this country...the way I see it is your not black...your not white...your not brown...WE are RED...WHITE and BLUE
because WE are American.
Americans Unite 
not Divide....we all bleed the same color blood.
This truly is a Civil Cyber War...look at all of us turning against eachother....1 day we love Em...the next we hate him...1 day his fans are everything...the next day...we can all go fuck ourselves.
Ok...WOW...Thats real American Pride.
We should all be so damn proud of ourselves...
We are the world so lets start TAKING...instead of Giving...lets make the world a little more evil with darkness instead of  BRIGHTER days....cuz theres a choice we're make.
Damn Dr. king and Michael Jackson would feel the love.
History gone no where...still destroyed and their legacy demolished Their words of love and words of encouragment enforced for the people they stood for....ALL OF US
AMAZING.
The shame brought to those who fought for us...who have DIED for us...America is NOT about our President.
Its about US...and what we do together that makes the differance...we can't do SHIT on the level we're all at now...how can we fight when the enemy sees our weakness.
The War was there long before Trump and Long before any of us...yet what are we doing?
With all these BS comments and BS video put out by Em...none of it is polically correct!
Fuck you 😂
Bye
